javadoc: Array of shorts that grows as needed.

methods.name: put
methods.comment:
Puts the given short value into the short array at
 the given index

methods.name: remove
methods.comment: Sets the value at the given index to 0.

methods.name: get
methods.comment: Returns the short at the given index

return.comment:
The short value at the given index. A 0 will
 be return for any index not initialized to
 another value.

name: ShortArray
comment: Array of shorts that grows as needed.
